description: Cognitive Car Dashboard workspace which allows multi-turn conversations to perform tasks in the car.

dialog_nodes.parent: Entry Point For Up Down Commands

values: I understand you want me to turn up something. You can say increase the volume or turn up the AC.

dialog_nodes.parent: Entry Point For Up Down Commands

output.text: I can only perform one operation at a time. We can start with the first one. What would you like me to do?

dialog_nodes.parent: Entry Point For Up Down Commands

values: Sure thing! Which genre would you prefer? Jazz is my personal favorite.
I prefer not to text while I drive.

output.text: Sorry I can't make a phone call. I must be all out of minutes!
Ok. Navigating to the closest restroom.

values: I found 5 locations. Which @amenity would you like? You can say first, third, nearest and so on.
Sure! Navigating to restroom @sys-number on the list. We should be there soon.

output.text: Ok. Navigating to the @option restroom. We should get there quickly.
Sorry I don't recognize that genre. Want to try something? Jazz? Rock?
Sorry I haven't yet learnt to perform operations with phones.

values: Sure! Navigating to gas station @sys-number on the list.

output.text: Sure! Navigating to the @option gas station.

values: Sorry I haven't learned answers to questions like this.
That question is out of scope for this application, take a look at the Conversation Enhanced application to handle questions like these.
I'll turn off the @genre for you.
Great choice! Playing some @genre for you.
It looks like the music is already off.
It looks like the music is already on.

output.text: I understand you want me to find a location. I can find restaurants, gas stations and restrooms nearby.
Sorry I don't have a listing for that and cannot drive you there.

values: I've found the closest restroom stops. Which one would you like to drive to?
Of course. Do you have a specific cuisine in mind?
Last time you had $previous_cuisine, would you like that again?
There are gas stations nearby. Which one would you like to drive to?
I found 5 locations. Which option would you like? You can say first, third, nearest and so on.

output.text: I understand you want me to turn on something. You can say turn on the wipers or switch on the lights.
